text: Kamagh amizɨ, ia bar vaghvagh deravɨra faragh nɨghnɨgh, egh bizir ia anɨngasa ifongezim faragha a gɨfogh. Gumazitam uan bizitam anɨngsɨ egh osɨman maraghe, egh suam, me bizibara anɨngasa puvɨrama e gaghora e abɨri. Gumazir bar akuegha uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua biziba anɨdim, God gumazir kam bar a gifonge.
